snippet: Fifty international aid groups and United Nations agencies urged Israel on Thursday to open Gaza’s borders, saying its border blockade violates international law.
abstract: Fifty international aid groups and United Nations agencies urge Israel to open Gaza’s borders, saying its blockade violates international law and indiscriminately harms Gaza’s 1.6 million people.
lead_paragraph: Fifty international aid groups and United Nations agencies urged Israel on Thursday to open Gaza’s borders, saying its border blockade violates international law.

headline.seo: Aid Groups and U.N. Agencies Urge Israel to Lift Gaza Blockade
headline.main: Aid Groups and U.N. Agencies Urge Israel to Lift Gaza Blockade
headline.print_headline: Aid Groups and U.N. Agencies Urge Israel to Lift Gaza Blockade
